rows.label: qst106017_msg0001
rows.name:
Dad, what kind of preparations
are you planning for Hana, mo?

rows.label: qst106017_msg0002
rows.name:
Exercises, mo? Hana is
always ready for them, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0003
rows.name:
Exercises? What are you
talking about, mo?

rows.label: qst106017_msg0004
rows.name:
Aren't we supposed to do
exercises to prepare for
the modification, mo?

rows.label: qst106017_msg0006
rows.name:
As long as you oil her joints,
there's no need for that, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0007
rows.name:
More importantly, Tora, take
Hana to the Goldmund Flight
Deck in Avaritia, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0009
rows.name:
She will be a trial student
at Bluesky Nopon University
for one day, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0010
rows.name:
I have already submitted
the application, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0011
rows.name:
Listen, Hana. To become a
first-class lady, various
refinements are necessary, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0012
rows.name:
For that purpose, you must
thoroughly acquire refinement
at Bluesky Nopon University, mo!

rows.label: qst106017_msg0013
rows.name:
I doubt what can be acquired
in just one day, mo...

rows.label: qst106017_msg0014
rows.name:
Tora, was it essential for the
modification to have Hana enter
university, even for a day, mo?

rows.label: qst106017_msg0015
rows.name: That's true, mo...! I'm convinced, mo.

rows.label: qst106017_msg0016
rows.name:
Then, Hana, learn well from
Fuwafuwa- sensei at Bluesky
Nopon University, mo!

rows.label: qst106017_msg0017
rows.name:
Understood, mo! Hana will
become a first-class lady, mo!
